name: FromJapanWithLove
tag_list: shopping, bento-box, kawaii, japan, japanese, plush, stationary, cell-phone-strap, craft-supplies, hello-kitty, hannari-tofu
description: Every item on our site is hand selected,
overview:
Welcome to From-Japan-With-Love.com! Our name says it all, but for those of you who are new to shopping with us we wanted to tell you a little about ourselves.

http://www.from-japan-with-love.com/

We are a husband and wife team of Japanese and Canadian origins. I (Sofia) have been here 10 years and absolutely love the expectation of beauty that exists here. From the historical temples to the pottery and handicrafts, there is a quality of life that I did not experience back home and I think it comes down to this expectation of beauty. I fell in love with the art, the paper, the culture of crafting here and started a shop on etsy.com to make some of these things available as supplies for artists and crafters abroad. The store on etsy has been very successful and became popular quickly. I got so many requests for other types of items that simply did not qualify to be listed on etsy.com that my husband (Futoshi) and I decided to offer a wider selection of uniquely Japanese things on this site and run both sites together.

Thanks for visiting us at From-Japan-With-Love. We are looking forward to your purchase you won’t be disappointed with the quality of items and the care we take in packaging and shipping them to you.

Tweet Our store on twitter!! http://twitter.com/kawaiishopping

Follow us on Fan Page in Facebook!! http://www.facebook.com/fromjapanwithlove

For more information about us, updates on products and general life in Japan stories see our blog at http://from-japan-with-love.blogspot.com/

Our Other Stores on Etsy

For handmade rings http://souzoucreations.etsy.com

For Japanese vintage goods http://vintagefromjapan.etsy.com

For Japanese stickers, fabric, and more http://fromjapanwithlove.etsy.com
